com.esri.mo2.ui.toc
Class FeatureLegendNode

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode
        |
        +--com.esri.mo2.ui.toc.LegendNode
              |
              +--com.esri.mo2.ui.toc.FeatureLegendNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, MutableTreeNode, Serializable, TreeNode
public class FeatureLegendNode
extends LegendNode

A FeatureLegendNode represents a FeatureLayer within the Toc. It has one or more SymbolLeafNode(s) as its child nodes.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Refreshes the FeatureLegendNode, the method will remove its all subnodes and reconstructs new leaf nodes based on the new renderers, symbols, or color.
